paragraphs: We have been working since 2014, informing Russian-speaking residents of the Czech Republic daily about the most important events in the country and the world. The main goal of our work is to bring benefits to our readers. This principle has allowed us to earn the trust of the audience, which we highly value.
Therefore, there has never been and will never be any advertising for gambling, bookmakers, or companies with a questionable reputation on "Vinegret".
A detailed "portrait" of our audience is presented in the media kit. You can download it or view it in the slider below:

At "Vinegret" you can place both media and text advertising: articles, banners, announcements, press releases, photo reports, event highlights, contests, and much more. Below is a price list with the main and most popular formats (you can download the PDF version here):
This is far from all the possibilities. If you are planning a long advertising campaign, we will be happy to discuss the details and provide special conditions.
Vinegret.cz - a useful website for life in the Czech Republic
